pageContext.claim: “No, Biden can wear a mask, but he was standing outside with his wife -- perfect conditions, perfect weather. They're inside, and they don't wear masks. And so I thought it was very unusual that he had one on. But I thought that was fine. I wasn't criticizing him at all. Why would I ever do anything like that?”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump campaign has been running Facebook ads mocking Biden for wearing a mask, complete with an image of a Chinese flag behind him. Trump at one point dismissed a reporter as being "politically correct" for wearing a mask.
